  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">News Breaking Headlines in Israel - Are the Stories the Same?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Nachrichten, die Schlagzeilen in Israel - 
sind die brechen, Geschichten dieselben?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des nouvelles cassant des titres en Israel - les 
histoires sont-elles les mêmes ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notícia que quebra headlines em Israel - são as
histórias o mesmos?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Notizie che rompono i titoli nell'Israele - sono 
le storia lo stessi?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ειδήσεις που σπάζουν τους τίτλους στο Ισραήλ - είναι 
οι ιστορίες οι ίδιες;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Las noticias que rompen títulos en Israel - 
están las historias iguales?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Compare and contrast similar newspaper articles from on-line Israeli newspapers English edition</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">israeli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">newspaper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">headlines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">news</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen Sie und kontrastieren Sie ähnliche 
Zeitungsartikel israelische Onlinezeitungen von der englischen 
Ausgabe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparez et contrastez les articles de journal semblables 
de l'édition en anglais de journaux israéliens en ligne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compare e contraste artigos de jornal similares da 
edição inglesa dos jornais israeli em linha</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronti e contrapponga gli articoli di stampa simili 
dall'edizione inglese dei giornali israeliani in linea</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκρίνετε και αντιπαραβάλτε τα παρόμοια άρθρα 
εφημερίδων από τη σε απευθείας σύνδεση ισραηλινή αγγλική έκδοση
εφημερίδων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compare y ponga en contraste los artículos periodísticos
similares de la edición inglesa de los periódicos israelíes en 
línea</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">israelisch</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
